Today the city of Nanjing mourns for the #NanjingMassacre victims on #NationalMemorialDay.

A national memorial ceremony was held at 10 am and a bell rang over the city between 10:01 and 10:02. The memorial hall lowered the national flag to half-mast. #Jiangsu https://t.co/Es4m82wSaO
